title: How to Make a Basic Onion, Lettuce and Cheese Salad

steps.headline: First, chop the onion to roughly about 5mm width and 5mm length (this does not have to be exact).
Now put the onions in the bowl and grate the cheese into the bowl with a grater.
Rip the lettuce into small pieces and put them into the bowl, and stir all the ingredients together with the wooden spoon.
Next stir a tablespoon of salad cream into the ingredients.
Chop the cucumber into slices and stir it into the bowl.
Now eat it with family and friends or enjoy on your own!

text: First, chop the onion to roughly about 5mm width and 5mm length (this does not have to be exact).  Now put the onions in the bowl and grate the cheese into the bowl with a grater.  Rip the lettuce into small pieces and put them into the bowl, and stir all the ingredients together with the wooden spoon.  Next stir a tablespoon of salad cream into the ingredients.  Chop the cucumber into slices and stir it into the bowl.  Now eat it with family and friends or enjoy on your own!
